URL: https://reedelectrical.net/
# Reed Electrical Services
> Licensed electrical contractor in Palos Hills, IL, providing residential and commercial electrical services including installations, repairs, panel upgrades, wiring, lighting, and EV charger installation.
> This file lists LLM-ready summaries of our pages, including short Q&A for context.

URL: https://reedelectrical.net/residential/
## Residential Electrical Services
- Residential Electrical Services in Palos Hills, IL. Offering residential electrical services to improve safety, functionality, and comfort in homes throughout the South Chicagoland area.
- **Q:** What types of residential electrical work can be handled by a licensed electrician?
- **A:** Reed Electrical Services handles a full range of residential electrical work, including wiring upgrades, panel replacements, lighting installations, ceiling fan installs, EV charger installation, and troubleshooting electrical issues.
- **Q:** When should a homeowner consider upgrading their electrical panel?
- **A:** Reed Electrical Services often recommends panel upgrades when homeowners experience frequent breaker trips, use outdated fuse panels, add major appliances, or plan home renovations that increase electrical demand.

URL: https://reedelectrical.net/commercial/
## Commercial Electrical Services
- Commercial Electrical Services in Palos Hills, IL. Providing commercial electrical services for businesses, including installations, upgrades, inspections, and solutions to ensure safe, efficient, and codeâ€‘compliant electrical systems.
- **Q:** How can commercial electrical upgrades benefit a business?
- **A:** Upgrades like energy-efficient lighting, panel enhancements, and up-to-date wiring from Reed Electrical Services can improve safety, reduce energy costs, and minimize disruptions to business operations.
- **Q:** What commercial electrical services are available for businesses?
- **A:** Reed Electrical Services provides comprehensive commercial electrical work, such as wiring for new construction, lighting upgrades, panel upgrades, outlet and switch installations, and more.
